roles.title: HEAD OF STUDENT MEDIA TEAM
description: Led the university's first student-led media team, recruiting and managing a group of over 12 students to cover campus events and student activities.
Directed photo, video, and digital content production, providing full coverage of more than 25 major academic and social events during tenure.
Designed and implemented a social media content strategy that grew the university's official Instagram and Facebook engagement by over 40% in one academic year.
Mentored team members in reporting, camera operations, editing, and on-air presentation with 5 students later joining professional media organizations.

roles.title: EVENT PHOTOGRAPHER
description: Delivered 150+ projects for clients across weddings, corporate events, and branding campaigns, maintaining a 95% client satisfaction rate.
Increased client retention by 40% through high-quality deliverables and exceptional customer service.
Edited and produced 200+ videos, achieving an average engagement rate of 20% higher than industry benchmarks for social media content.

roles.title: PROGRAM COORDINATOR
description: Produced and managed the daily 4 PM news segment, overseeing scripting, editing, and coordination with a team of reporters and interns.
Increased online engagement by 20% through audience analysis and data-driven refinements to content delivery and digital strategy.
Co-hosted the station's entertainment segment, contributing to a 15% rise in viewership while balancing news production responsibilities.
Produced news story packages and secured exclusive interviews.
Wrote and presented broadcast-ready scripts daily, improving newsroom efficiency by cutting editing time for producers by 20%.
Collaborated with producers and camera crew to deliver high-quality visual storytelling.
